title: [Shattered Moors, Salt Marsh]
description: A massive boulder rises from the muck and mud of the marsh.  The air is gravid with the primordial odor of decaying vegetation, thick alluvial ooze, and slow-moving brackish water.  Through the reeds and bullrushes to the southeast one can glimpse the moonlight glinting off the blue roof of an ancient tower.

A massive boulder rises from the muck and mud of the marsh.  The air is gravid with the primordial odor of decaying vegetation, thick alluvial ooze, and slow-moving brackish water.  Through the reeds and bullrushes to the southeast one can glimpse the sun glinting off the blue roof of an ancient tower.
